What are the genetic changes related to Bannayan-Riley-Ruvalcaba syndrome ?,"About 60 percent of all cases of Bannayan-Riley-Ruvalcaba syndrome result from mutations in the PTEN gene. Another 10 percent of cases are caused by a large deletion of gen
